text: Earned by killing an enemy unit in battle
Undead servants can be found in your recruitment pool
Killing certain enemies creates a 100% chance to gain an undead servant
War declared on Legions of Nagashizzar\\n\\n
A Morghast Archai joins your cause!

As the Dread King's warriors die on the battlefield, their spirits enter the Realm of Souls. As the Realm of Souls fills past certain thresholds, the [[sl:battle_units]]units[[/sl]] that remain will regenerate for short periods.
